pages.text: The $(b)Alchemy Table$() is the heart of magical crafting. It transforms materials using mana and experience.$(br2)$(violet)Essential for all advanced recipes!$()

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: $(l)Using the Alchemy Table:$()$(br2)1. Place ingredients in the $(violet)10 circular slots$()$(br)2. Output appears in the $(violet)center slot$()$(br)3. Requires $(#)XP levels$() and $(#)processing time$()$(br)4. Most recipes need a $(violet)catalyst$() (Alchemical or Resonant)

pages.title: Slot Layout
pages.text: $(l)Alchemy Table Layout:$()$(br2)• $(violet)10 Input Slots$() arranged in a circle$(br)• $(violet)1 Output Slot$() in the center$(br)• Ingredients must have correct $(#)item$() and $(#)NBT data$()$(br)• Catalysts need full mana (10,000)

pages.title: Crafting Tips
pages.text: $(l)Alchemy Tips:$()$(br2)• Keep spare charged catalysts ready$(br)• Higher XP recipes = better rewards$(br)• Processing time varies by recipe$(br)• Some recipes require specific NBT data$(br)• Check recipe book for details!
